question:
You are currently trying to improve your knowledge of a language which is not your first language.You have a friend who speaks this language fluently.You have decided to write to this friend


Write a letter to your friend.In your letter,


Explain why you want to improve your knowledge of this language 
ask him/her for suggestions on how to learn more quickly.
propose that you meet your friend to talk about it.
Write at least 150 words.
text: Hope You're and your family doing well,

Firstly, I'm writing to ask for your help as you know very well I was born and raised in an Arabic family and since my ,childhood. I've been speaking Arabic and Now I'd like to learn the English language because it's a widely spoken language throughout the world and I know that you're quite proficient and fluent in English speaking owing to your mother tongue. so here I'd like some  valuable advice for improvements as  I wanna inform you that I have a plan for moving to Canada for further education that's why it's  essential to learn because in Canada English and French are native languages.

Secondly, could you tell me? how can I grab it swiftly and smoothly from which sources and websites furthermore, if you could send me crucial material for practising that would be beneficial for me during the hard learning time?  in addition, as you know well I'm keen on gaining knowledge from my early school life.

Lastly, I'd be really grateful if we hang out at your convenience day and time  I think it would be better to discuss  the current situation face to face and I'll be able to learn something valuable that would be advantageous in the language prospectus.
Hope to hear from you soon about catching up.
